name: Maze Tap - Simple Tap Puzzle Game of Reflexes
name_original: Maze Tap - Simple Tap Puzzle Game of Reflexes
description:
"Addicting Puzzle Game!"
"Way more challenging than most puzzle games!"

If you love puzzles and you love challenges, you'll love Maze Tap. With simple one touch mechanics, Maze Tap is a puzzle game that starts off simple, but gets harder with each level.

Your goal is to get the ball to the white circle. Simply, tap the screen to get the ball moving. When you get to the goal, you’ll go to the next level. Losing a level means you go back a level.

Some levels are easy and some levels are hard. Some levels even have moving obstacles and you’ll really find out how good your reflexes are.

Download Maze Tap today and have fun!
